paramInformation.label: LED Indication Configuration
paramInformation.description: LED status when device on or off.

options.label: LED ON when load is OFF
LED On when light is turned On

paramInformation.label: Dim up/down rate
paramInformation.description: Adjust the speed at which the ramps to a specific value other than 0 and FF

paramInformation.label: Switch Mode
paramInformation.description: Turn your dimmer into an On/Off switch with switch mode

paramInformation.label: Alternate Exclusion
paramInformation.description: Never accidentally remove a device during with alternate exclusion

options.label: Normal operation, press any button on the device
Press two times ON button and two times OFF button, LED will flash 5 times if exclusion is successful

paramInformation.label: Minimum Dim Threshold
paramInformation.description: Set the minimum dimmer threshold when manually or remotely controlled

paramInformation.label: Maximum Brightness Threshold
paramInformation.description: Set the maximum brightness threshold when manually or remotely controlled

paramInformation.label: Default Brightness Level
paramInformation.description: Set the default brightness level that the dimmer will turn on when being controlled manually

metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified
controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release
the top or bottom of the wireless smart dimmer (rocker)
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller
to remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press and
release the top or bottom of the wireless smart dimmer (rocker)
metadata.reset:
1. Quickly press ON (top) button three times, then immediately
press the OFF (Bottom) button three times. The LED will
flash ON/OFF five times when completed successfully.
Note: This should only be used if your networkâ€™s primary
controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
